statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, app_name FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT app_name, theme_color FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY theme_color DESC;
SELECT user_id, app_name, notification_enabled FROM user_preferences WHERE theme_color = 'blue';
SELECT user_id, app_name, theme_color, notification_enabled FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT app_name, theme_color FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE theme_color IN ('blue', 'green') ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, app_name, notification_enabled FROM user_preferences ORDER BY app_name ASC, user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT theme_color FROM user_preferences WHERE app_name LIKE 'App%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark'
SELECT theme, user_id FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT * FROM app_settings WHERE app_id = 1
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'light';
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE theme LIKE 'dar%';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE language IN ('English', 'Spanish');
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences ORDER BY theme DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, language_id FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT app_name, dark_mode_enabled FROM app_settings WHERE notification_enabled = true;
SELECT app_name, notification_enabled FROM app_settings WHERE dark_mode_enabled = false ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT session_id, last_login FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE theme_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, language_id FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY language_id DESC;
SELECT app_name, notification_enabled FROM app_settings WHERE notification_enabled = true AND dark_mode_enabled = false;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 50 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, session_id FROM user_sessions WHERE session_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT preference_key, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_key LIKE '%color%';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY preference_key ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(preference_key) AS preference_count FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(preference_key) > 1;
SELECT user_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY preference_key ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND preference_key = 'theme';
SELECT user_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND preference_key LIKE 'color%';

SELECT user_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_key IN ('theme', 'background_color') AND user_id <> '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, password FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_sessions.session_id, user_accounts.username, user_sessions.start_time FROM user_sessions JOIN user_accounts ON user_sessions.user_id = user_accounts.user_id;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English' AND timezone = 'GMT';
SELECT log_description, log_time FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT setting_id, push_notifications, dark_mode FROM app_settings WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT session_id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM user_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_description, log_time FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
